name: Ghost Riot Post Mount Brake Asssembly Kit #KE0173
categories: Riot Post Mount Brake Asssembly Kit #KE0173
description: This is a parts kit for the post mount brake assembly on your Ghost Riot.Kit includes: 1x post mount 106.1mm x 78mm x 17.7mm, 1x washer Ø11mm x Ø6.4mm x 1.0mm, 1 x post mount screw M6 x 26mm x 20mm - T25.
